Title: Requires operators of motor vehicles to reduce their speed when approaching and passing mobile ice cream vendor vehicles
Summary: Requires operators of motor vehicles to reduce their speed when approaching and passing mobile ice cream vendor vehicles when such vendor vehicle is parked and in active operation.
LawCode: Amd ยง1180, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to requiring operators of motor vehicles to reduce speed when passing an ice cream truck
